body.p:
STATE OF KENTUCKY.
Office of Quarter-Master General,
Frankfort, Ky., March 13, 1865.
To His Excellency
T. E Bramlette
Governer of Ky.
Governor

We have the honor to recommend the following named persons for appointment and commission on the Staff of the Commander in Chief of the "Kentucky National Legion," for active service.
1 Jno B. Tilford Jr. A. Adjt General -- Rank -- Captain
1 Charles J. Clarke Aid de Camp -- " 1st Lieut
1 W. E. Cox Aid de Camp. 1st do
And that they be assigned to duty in the Office of the Adjutant General of Ky.
1. S. C. Sayres A. Q. M. -- Rank -- Captain
And that he be assigned to duty in the office of the Quarter Master General of Ky.
Also the following clerks, they having served one Year in the Military service of the State of Ky

Wm Stewart. Clerk in Inspector Generals Office.
Charles Hayden Mustering Officer, Clerk in Adjt Genls Office
The other clerks required by the duties of this Department have not as yet been selected for recommendation --

We submit a statment of the clerk Hire necessary at present & the means appropriated for that purpose -- say
Appropriation in 16th Sec of Mili. laws
$5400-
1 Clerk in Adjt Genl Office $1200 --
1 " " Inspr " " 1000 --
1 " " Adjt " " 800 --
1 " " Q. M Gen " " 1200 --
1 " " do " 9.00. -- $5100
Leaving a surplus Yearly of
$30000
which however may be required for additional assistance.

All of which is respectfully submitted, with the expression of our opinion, that this is the only arrangement we can now make by which the business of the Military department of the State can be continued in a satisfactory & efficient manner.

S. G. Suddarth
Q M Genl of Ky --
D, W, Lindsey
Adjt Genl Ky

The recommendations are approved and the commissions ordered to date from 6th March 1865 to the several officers herein recommended; -- who will be ordered upon active duty to report to Adjt Genl for assignment to duty. -- The clerks nominated will enter upon duty as of same date.
Adjt Genl Lindsey will issue Commissions and make the proper orders for carrying into effect these appointments.

Thos E Bramlette
Gov of Ky

Office of Qr. Mas. Genl
Frankfort Ky
Mar. 13" 1865
Suddarth S. G.
Q. M. Genl
Lindsey D. W.
Adjt. Genl Ky

Recommend several gentlemen for appointment & commission on staff of Comdr in chief, & ask that they be assigned to duty in offices of Q. M. Genl & Adj't Genl of the state. Also recommends several for appointment as clerks, with a statement of the clerks Hire necessary at present & the means appropriate for that purpose --
Recd A. G. O. Ky 14 Mar. 1865

The recommendations are approved and the commissions ordered to date from 6th March 1865, to the several officers herein reccommended, who will be ordered upon active duty to report to Adjt Genl for assignment to duty. The clerks nominated will enter upon duty as of same date, Adjt Genl Lindsey will issue commissions and make the proper orders for carrying into effect these appointments --

Thos E. Bramlette
Govr of Ky --
Issue commissions as recommended
D W Lindsey
Adj Genl KY
